paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark._
import org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD

import org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext

import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._

case class Credit(
    creditability: Double,
    balance: Double, duration: Double, history: Double, purpose: Double, amount: Double,
    savings: Double, employment: Double, instPercent: Double, sexMarried: Double, guarantors: Double,
    residenceDuration: Double, assets: Double, age: Double, concCredit: Double, apartment: Double,
    credits: Double, occupation: Double, dependents: Double, hasPhone: Double, foreign: Double
  )

val creditText: RDD[String] = sc.textFile("/home/anindya/zeppelin-spark-projects/spark-ml-randomforest-creditrisk/data/germancredit.csv")
val creditDF: DataFrame = creditText.map(parseCredit).toDF().cache()
creditDF.registerTempTable("credit")
creditDF.show(10)

paragraphs.text: creditDF.printSchema
sqlContext.sql("SELECT creditability, AVG(balance) as avgbalance, AVG(amount) as avgamt, AVG(duration) as avgdur FROM credit GROUP BY creditability").show
z.show(creditDF.groupBy("creditability").avg("balance"))
z.show(creditDF.groupBy("creditability").avg("amount"))
z.show(creditDF.groupBy("creditability").avg("duration"))
creditDF.describe("balance").show

val featureCols: Array[String] = Array("balance", "duration", "history", "purpose", "amount",
                                    "savings", "employment", "instPercent", "sexMarried", "guarantors",
                                    "residenceDuration", "assets", "age", "concCredit", "apartment",
                                    "credits", "occupation", "dependents", "hasPhone", "foreign")                                    
val assembler: VectorAssembler = new VectorAssembler().setInputCols(featureCols).setOutputCol("features")
val assembledDF: DataFrame = assembler.transform(creditDF)
z.show(assembledDF.sample(withReplacement=false,fraction=0.01))

import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.StringIndexer
val labelIndexer: StringIndexer = new StringIndexer().setInputCol("creditability").setOutputCol("label")
val labelIndexedDF: DataFrame = labelIndexer.fit(df2).transform(assembledDF)
z.show(labelIndexedDF.sample(withReplacement=false,fraction=0.01))

val splitSeed: Int = 5043
val Array(trainingData, testData) = labelIndexedDF.randomSplit(Array(0.7, 0.3), seed=splitSeed)

val classifier: RandomForestClassifier = new RandomForestClassifier()
                                                .setImpurity("gini")
                                                .setMaxDepth(3)
                                                .setNumTrees(20)
                                                .setFeatureSubsetStrategy("auto")
                                                .setSeed(splitSeed)

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.classification.RandomForestClassificationModel
val model: RandomForestClassificationModel = classifier.fit(trainingData)
model.toDebugString

result.msg:
evaluator: org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.BinaryClassificationEvaluator = binEval_2070b50e0466

predictions: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [creditability: double, balance: double ... 24 more fields]

accuracy: Double = 0.7824906081835716
Accuracy Before Pipeline Fitting: 0.7824906081835716

paragraphs.text:
val evaluator: BinaryClassificationEvaluator = new BinaryClassificationEvaluator().setMetricName("areaUnderROC").setLabelCol("label")
val predictions: DataFrame = model.transform(testData)
val accuracy: Double = evaluator.evaluate(predictions)
println("Accuracy Before Pipeline Fitting: " + accuracy)
z.show(predictions.sample(withReplacement=false,fraction=0.05).select("creditability", "label", "rawPrediction", "probability", "prediction"))

result.msg:
rm: org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.RegressionMetrics = org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.RegressionMetrics@1bf0ee5b
MSE: 0.3110367892976589
MAE: 0.3110367892976589
RMSE Squared: 0.5577067233749822
R Squared: -0.41166615900091386
Explained Variance: 0.1131866533931387

paragraphs.text:
val rm: RegressionMetrics = new RegressionMetrics(
      predictions.select("prediction", "label").rdd.map(x =>
        (x(0).asInstanceOf[Double], x(1).asInstanceOf[Double]))
    )
println("MSE: " + rm.meanSquaredError)
println("MAE: " + rm.meanAbsoluteError)
println("RMSE Squared: " + rm.rootMeanSquaredError)
println("R Squared: " + rm.r2)
println("Explained Variance: " + rm.explainedVariance)

import org.apache.spark.ml.param.ParamMap
import org.apache.spark.ml.{ Pipeline, PipelineStage }
import org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.{ ParamGridBuilder, CrossValidator }

val paramGrid: Array[ParamMap] = new ParamGridBuilder()
      .addGrid(classifier.maxBins, Array(25, 31))
      .addGrid(classifier.maxDepth, Array(5, 10))
      .addGrid(classifier.numTrees, Array(20, 60))
      .addGrid(classifier.impurity, Array("entropy", "gini"))
      .build()

val steps: Array[PipelineStage] = Array(classifier)
val pipeline: Pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(steps)

val cv: CrossValidator = new CrossValidator()
                            .setEstimator(pipeline)
                            .setEvaluator(evaluator)
                            .setEstimatorParamMaps(paramGrid)
                            .setNumFolds(10)

import org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.CrossValidatorModel
val pipelineFittedModel: CrossValidatorModel = cv.fit(trainingData)

paragraphs.text:
val cvpredictions: DataFrame = pipelineFittedModel.transform(testData)
val cvaccuracy: Double = evaluator.evaluate(cvpredictions)
println("Accuracy After Pipeline Fitting: " + cvaccuracy)

println(pipelineFittedModel.bestModel.asInstanceOf[org.apache.spark.ml.PipelineModel].stages(0))

                                                    .rdd.map(x => (x(0).asInstanceOf[Double], x(1).asInstanceOf[Double])))
